actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Claw

specialTraits.description: The skulk is invisible. This invisibility can be circumvented by three things:
specialTraits.name: Fallible Invisibility

specialTraits.description: The skulk appears as a dim, translucent form in the light of a candle made of fat rendered from a corpse whose identity is unknown.
specialTraits.name: Charnel Candles

specialTraits.description: Humanoid children, aged 10 and under, can see through this invisibility.
specialTraits.name: Children

specialTraits.description: The skulk appears as a drab, smoothskinned biped if its reflection can be seen in a mirror or on another surface.
specialTraits.name: Reflective Surfaces

specialTraits.description: The skulk leaves no tracks to indicate where it has been or where it's headed.
specialTraits.name: Trackless
